committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to amend the Act authorizing the establishment of the Congaree Swamp National Monument to provide that at such time as the principal visitors center at such monument is established, such center shall be designated as the "Harry R. E. Hampton Visitors Center".

summary.text: Provides that when the principal visitors center at the Congaree Swamp National Monument in South Carolina is established, such center shall be designated as the Harry R. E. Hampton Visitors Center.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act authorizing the establishment of the Congaree Swamp National Monument to provide that at such time as the principal visitors center at such monument is established, such center shall be designated as the "Harry R. E. Hampton Visitors Center".
